title: Leonard.Cohen.Live.at.the.Isle.of.Wight.1970.Blu-ray.720p.XviD.M
description:
Leonard Cohen (and ONLY Leonard Cohen) Live at the Isle of Wight in 1970.

I am pleased to inform you that, for your viewing enjoyment, extraneous and useless, although often comic commentary by some of the usual media whores "Bob Johnston", "Judy Collins", "Joan Baez (today)" and of course the one and only "Kris Kristofferson" AKA "Kris The Dish" have been painstakingly exorcised from this video. Thus you may notice a few audio glitches here and there, but for the most part it is all quite fine.

That being the case, you will have to purchase the full version in order to witness such gems as Judy Collins in an apparent momentary lapse of sobriety taking full credit for Mr. Cohen's prowess as a performer. This is a MUST SEE!

However, I must admit that the same Judy Collins voicing-over Suzanne was simply inexcusable. I had to resort to voice-removal software to remedy that abomination.

In other news:
--------------
Last I heard Kris (The Dish) was in hospital having torn a neck muscle while gallantly leaping in front of an active camera. His state is said to be "stable".
